page.title: 07BRIDGE FARM
page.content: Bridge Farm is owned by Mr and Mr Pingree. It has always been arable land.They have a shop where everything that is sold they have grown.They run the farm by themselves,but in strawberry time they hire three workers.They grow corn, barley,onions,lemons,cauliflowers, carrots,mushrooms,lettuces,pears, cucumbers,tomatoes,strawberries, cabbages,potatoes,rhubarb,apples, sweetcorn,plums,leeks,runner beans, broad beans,raspberries,red beet, peppers,marrows.The corn and barley go to merchants.They have 11.73 hectares, 3.64 hectares of corn, 1.01 hectares of strawberries,and 0.20 hectares of potatoes.
